message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I think it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway.
I understand your position, Bob, but I can't go as low as $90.  How about we settle on $100? It's a fair price considering the value you'll be getting.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about $95?
